history.expiredMessage: This image has expired and will be deleted soon

deletion.imageWarning: Images are automatically deleted after 14 days to manage storage. Download images you want to keep permanently.
deletion.videoWarning: Videos are automatically deleted after 14 days to manage storage. Download videos you want to keep permanently.
deletion.extensionInfoImages: Regular users can extend storage up to 3 times (7 days each)
deletion.extensionInfoVideos: Regular users can extend storage up to 1 time (7 days extra)

warnings.videoProcessingMessage: Video processing typically takes 2-5 minutes. Please be patient while we create your video.
warnings.largeDimensions: Large dimensions may take longer to generate
warnings.autoDeleteionMessage: Videos are automatically deleted after 14 days to manage storage. Download videos you want to keep permanently.
warnings.extensionInfo: Regular users can extend storage up to 1 time (7 days extra)
